name: continuous-learning-plugins
description: Personal collection of Claude Code plugins for knowledge management and development workflows

plugins.name: learning-vault
plugins.description: Capture technical learnings to Obsidian vault using Zettelkasten method. Integrates with Obsidian MCP server to create atomic, linked knowledge notes from development work.

plugins.name: anki-flashcards
plugins.description: Create Anki flashcards from conversation context for continuous learning with spaced repetition. Includes /flashcard command, quality review agent, and best practices skill.
